attributes.action: qualifications for holding the directorsship of a bailiff company
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently you do not have to have any thing other than a clear credit record to hold a bailiff certificate and also run a bailiff company. I am petitioning the pm to change this. If someone wants to start up a bailiff company then they shouid have a diploma or degree prior to applying to companies house and also should have to renew their licenec every 2-3 years.
